verses.verse: אֵ֜לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These מַסְעֵ֣י <WH4550> mas-'Ei These [are] the journeys בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which יָצְא֛וּ <WH3318> ya-tze-'U which went forth מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> le-tziv-'o-Tam; with their armies בְּיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- under the hand מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh of Moses וְאַהֲרֹֽן׃ <WH175> ve-'a-ha-Ron. and Aaron

וַיִּכְתֹּ֨ב <WH3789> vai-yich-To wrote מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מוֹצָאֵיהֶ֛ם <WH4161> mo-tza-'ei-Hem their goings out לְמַסְעֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4550> le-mas-'ei-Hem according to their journeys עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- by פִּ֣י <WH6310> pi by the commandment יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD וְאֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh and these מַסְעֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4550> mas-'ei-Hem and these [are] their journeys לְמוֹצָאֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4161> le-mo-tza-'ei-Hem. according to their goings out

וַיִּסְע֤וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they departed מֵֽרַעְמְסֵס֙ <WH7486> me-ra'-me-Ses from Rameses בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> ba-Cho-desh month הָרִאשׁ֔וֹן <WH7223> ha-ri-Shon, in the first בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <WH2568> ba-cha-mish-Shah fif עָשָׂ֛ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar teen י֖וֹם <WH3117> Yom day לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh month הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <WH7223> ha-ri-Shon; of the first מִֽמָּחֳרַ֣ת <WH4283> mi-mo-cho-Rat on the morrow הַפֶּ֗סַח <WH6453> hap-Pe-sach, after the passover יָצְא֤וּ <WH3318> ya-tze-'U went out בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בְּיָ֣ד <WH3027> be-Yad hand רָמָ֔ה <WH7311> ra-Mah, with an high לְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> le-'ei-Nei in the sight כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- of all מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4713> mitz-Ra-yim. Egyptian

וּמִצְרַ֣יִם <WH4713> u-mitz-Ra-yim Egyptian מְקַבְּרִ֗ים <WH6912> me-kab-be-Rim, buried אֵת֩ <WH853> 'et אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom הִכָּ֧ה <WH5221> hik-Kah had smitten יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD בָּהֶ֖ם ba-Hem כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all בְּכ֑וֹר <WH1060> be-Chor; all [their] firstborn וּבֵאלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <WH430> u-ve-Lo-hei-Hem, among them upon their gods עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah executed יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh also the LORD שְׁפָטִֽים׃ <WH8201> she-fa-Tim. judgments

וַיִּסְע֥וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U removed בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מֵרַעְמְסֵ֑ס <WH7486> me-ra'-me-Ses; from Rameses וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּסֻכֹּֽת׃ <WH5523> be-suk-Kot. in Succoth

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they departed מִסֻּכֹּ֑ת <WH5523> mis-suk-Kot; from Succoth וַיַּחֲנ֣וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְאֵתָ֔ם <WH864> ve-'e-Tam, in Etham אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בִּקְצֵ֥ה <WH7097> bik-Tzeh which [is] in the edge הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> ham-mid-Bar. of the wilderness

וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they removed מֵֽאֵתָ֔ם <WH864> me-'e-Tam, from Etham וַיָּ֙שָׁב֙ <WH7725> vai-Ya-shov and turned again עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and פִּ֣י pi הַחִירֹ֔ת <WH6367> ha-chi-Rot, unto Pihahiroth אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> pe-Nei before בַּ֣עַל Ba-'al צְפ֑וֹן <WH1189> tze-Fon; which [is] before Baalzephon וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and they pitched לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lif-Nei before מִגְדֹּֽל׃ <WH4024> mig-Dol. Migdol

וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they departed מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei from before הַֽחִירֹ֔ת <WH6367> ha-chi-Rot, Pihahiroth וַיַּֽעַבְר֥וּ <WH5674> vai-ya-'av-Ru and passed through בְתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> ve-toch- the midst הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> hai-Yam of the sea הַמִּדְבָּ֑רָה <WH4057> ham-mid-Ba-rah; into the wilderness וַיֵּ֨לְכ֜וּ <WH1980> vai-Ye-le-Chu went דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech journey שְׁלֹ֤שֶׁת <WH7969> she-Lo-shet three יָמִים֙ <WH3117> ya-Mim days' בְּמִדְבַּ֣ר <WH4057> be-mid-Bar in the wilderness אֵתָ֔ם <WH864> 'e-Tam, of Etham וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּמָרָֽה׃ <WH4785> be-ma-Rah. in Marah

וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they removed מִמָּרָ֔ה <WH4785> mi-ma-Rah, from Marah וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u and came אֵילִ֑מָה <WH362> 'ei-Li-mah; unto Elim וּ֠בְאֵילִם <WH362> U-ve-'ei-lim and in Elim שְׁתֵּ֣ים <WH8147> she-Teim both עֶשְׂרֵ֞ה <WH6240> 'es-Reh ten עֵינֹ֥ת <WH5869> 'ei-Not fountains מַ֛יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim of water וְשִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> ve-shiv-'Im and threescore and ten תְּמָרִ֖ים <WH8558> te-ma-Rim palm trees וַיַּחֲנוּ־ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-nu- and they pitched שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> Sham. there

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they removed מֵאֵילִ֑ם <WH362> me-'ei-Lim; from Elim וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and יַם־ <WH3220> yam- sea סֽוּף׃ <WH5488> Suf. by the Red

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they removed מִיַּם־ <WH3220> mi-yam- sea ס֑וּף <WH5488> Suf; from the Red וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בְּמִדְבַּר־ <WH4057> be-mid-bar- in the wilderness סִֽין׃ <WH5512> Sin. of Sin

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they took their journey מִמִּדְבַּר־ <WH4057> mi-mid-bar- out of the wilderness סִ֑ין <WH5512> Sin; of Sin וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בְּדָפְקָֽה׃ <WH1850> be-da-fe-Kah. in Dophkah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they departed מִדָּפְקָ֑ה <WH1850> mid-da-fe-Kah; from Dophkah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בְּאָלֽוּשׁ׃ <WH442> be-'a-Lush. in Alush

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they removed מֵאָל֑וּשׁ <WH442> me-'a-Lush; from Alush וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בִּרְפִידִ֔ם <WH7508> bir-fi-Dim, at Rephidim וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- no הָ֨יָה <WH1961> Ha-yah had שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> sham now it was there מַ֛יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim where was no water לָעָ֖ם <WH5971> la-'Am for the people לִשְׁתּֽוֹת׃ <WH8354> lish-Tot. to drink

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they departed מֵרְפִידִ֑ם <WH7508> me-re-fi-Dim; from Rephidim וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> be-mid-Bar in the wilderness סִינָֽי׃ <WH5514> si-Nai. of Sinai

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they removed מִמִּדְבַּ֣ר <WH4057> mi-mid-Bar from the desert סִינָ֑י <WH5514> si-Nai; of Sinai וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּקִבְרֹ֥ת be-kiv-Rot הַֽתַּאֲוָֽה׃ <WH6914> Hat-ta-'a-Vah. at Kibrothhattaavah

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they departed מִקִּבְרֹ֣ת mik-kiv-Rot הַֽתַּאֲוָ֑ה <WH6914> hat-ta-'a-Vah; from Kibrothhattaavah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בַּחֲצֵרֹֽת׃ <WH2698> ba-cha-tze-Rot. at Hazeroth
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they departed מֵחֲצֵרֹ֑ת <WH2698> me-cha-tze-Rot; from Hazeroth וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּרִתְמָֽה׃ <WH7575> be-rit-Mah. in Rithmah

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they departed מֵרִתְמָ֑ה <WH7575> me-rit-Mah; from Rithmah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּרִמֹּ֥ן be-rim-Mon פָּֽרֶץ׃ <WH7428> Pa-retz. at Rimmonparez

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they departed מֵרִמֹּ֣ן me-rim-Mon פָּ֑רֶץ <WH7428> Pa-retz; from Rimmonparez וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּלִבְנָֽה׃ <WH3841> be-liv-Nah. in Libnah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they removed מִלִּבְנָ֑ה <WH3841> mil-liv-Nah; from Libnah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּרִסָּֽה׃ <WH7446> be-ris-Sah. at Rissah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they journeyed מֵרִסָּ֑ה <WH7446> me-ris-Sah; from Rissah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בִּקְהֵלָֽתָה׃ <WH6954> bik-he-La-tah. in Kehelathah

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they went מִקְּהֵלָ֑תָה <WH6954> mik-ke-he-La-tah; from Kehelathah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּהַר־ <WH2022> be-har- in mount שָֽׁפֶר׃ <WH8234> Sha-fer. Shapher

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they removed מֵֽהַר־ <WH2022> me-har- from mount שָׁ֑פֶר <WH8234> Sha-fer; Shapher וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בַּחֲרָדָֽה׃ <WH2732> ba-cha-ra-Dah. in Haradah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they removed מֵחֲרָדָ֑ה <WH2732> me-cha-ra-Dah; from Haradah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּמַקְהֵלֹֽת׃ <WH4722> be-mak-he-Lot. in Makheloth
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they removed מִמַּקְהֵלֹ֑ת <WH4722> mi-mak-he-Lot; from Makheloth וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בְּתָֽחַת׃ <WH8480> be-Ta-chat. at Tahath
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they departed מִתָּ֑חַת <WH8480> mit-Ta-chat; from Tahath וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּתָֽרַח׃ <WH8646> be-Ta-rach. at Tarah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they removed מִתָּ֑רַח <WH8646> mit-Ta-rach; from Tarah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּמִתְקָֽה׃ <WH4989> be-mit-Kah. in Mithcah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they went מִמִּתְקָ֑ה <WH4989> mi-mit-Kah; from Mithcah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּחַשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH2832> be-chash-mo-Nah. in Hashmonah

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they departed מֵֽחַשְׁמֹנָ֑ה <WH2832> me-chash-mo-Nah; from Hashmonah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בְּמֹסֵרֽוֹת׃ <WH4149> be-mo-se-Rot. at Moseroth

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they departed מִמֹּסֵר֑וֹת <WH4149> mi-mo-se-Rot; from Moseroth וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בִּבְנֵ֥י biv-Nei יַעֲקָֽן׃ <WH1142> ya-'a-Kan. in Benejaakan

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they removed מִבְּנֵ֣י mib-be-Nei יַעֲקָ֑ן <WH1142> ya-'a-Kan; from Benejaakan וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בְּחֹ֥ר be-Chor הַגִּדְגָּֽד׃ <WH2735> hag-gid-Gad. at Horhagidgad

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they went מֵחֹ֣ר me-Chor הַגִּדְגָּ֑ד <WH2735> hag-gid-Gad; from Horhagidgad וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּיָטְבָֽתָה׃ <WH3193> be-ya-te-Va-tah. in Jotbathah

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they removed מִיָּטְבָ֑תָה <WH3193> mi-ya-te-Va-tah; from Jotbathah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בְּעַבְרֹנָֽה׃ <WH5684> be-'av-ro-Nah. at Ebronah

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they departed מֵֽעַבְרֹנָ֑ה <WH5684> me-'av-ro-Nah; from Ebronah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בְּעֶצְי֥וֹן be-'etz-Yon גָּֽבֶר׃ <WH6100> Ga-ver. at Eziongaber

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they removed מֵעֶצְי֣וֹן me-'etz-Yon גָּ֑בֶר <WH6100> Ga-ver; from Eziongaber וַיַּחֲנ֥וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְמִדְבַּר־ <WH4057> ve-mid-bar- in the wilderness צִ֖ן <WH6790> tzin of Zin הִ֥וא <WH1931> hi that קָדֵֽשׁ׃ <WH6946> ka-Desh. which [is] Kadesh
